protocol.name: P-AFFY-2
protocol.text: Labeling of samples was carried out according to the manufacturerâ€™s standard protocol

protocol.name: P-MEXP-16111
protocol.text: RNA was extracted using TRIzol (Invitrogen) according to manufacturers protocol followed by a clean-up on Quiagen RNeasy columns.

protocol.name: P-MEXP-16146
protocol.text: Seedlings of Arabidopsis thaliana (L.) Heynh. (accession Columbia) were grown on MS medium for 8 days in growth chambers at 21 C under long day photoperiods (16 h light, 8 h darkness). The entire experiment was performed twice providing independent biological replicates. Samples were compared at 4 h and 21 h from the beginning of the light period.

protocol.name: P-MEXP-16147
protocol.text: Seedlings were pooled from 3 individual plates for each replicate.

protocol.name: P-MEXP-16148
protocol.text: GCRMA as included in the R package.
